TextBlock.Text: RAVA: This is amazing! And, party unsettling. This wasn't here when I first arrived.
JAI: I'd love to say it isn't complicated, but it is. I'll spare you the details.
RAVA: Oh, please, tell me. I'm seriously curious.
JAI: To put it simply, look at this cloth. We can wrap it around itself, and if we cut the cloth, we can push one end into the cut.
RAVA: You're folding space into itself?
JAI: Yes, and in the fifth dimension, we don't even need a cut. We can't picture it in our minds, but we can use it to our advantage.
